comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Short guy in the center is Bill Klem -- he was legendary: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Klem

comment.author: 90550919@N05
comment._content: Managers and umpires before Game One of the 1913 World Series on October 7th at the Polo Grounds in New York City. From left to right: Danny Murphy, Philadelphia Athletics team captain; Cy Rigler, left-field umpire; Bill Klem, home plate; Rip Egan, infield; Tom Connolly, right field; and John McGraw, manager of the New York Giants.  See Richard Alder's Mack, McGraw and the 1913 Baseball Season (Jefferson, NC: McFarland & Co. Inc., 2008), page 212.

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: thanks for the identification of these men.  We may update the record to include their names.
